[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
One-page website
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="45"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#knowstripe" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0" min_height="0" type="4" bg_color="#23272a"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="36"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text]This landing page is powered by The7 WordPress Theme.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="15"][vc_column_text] We used “Microsite” page template, Slider Revolution, some images and shortcodes. No additional line of code was written. You’ll find this page in dummy content that comes in themes package.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="36"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_fancy_image type="" style="1" lightbox="0" align="centre" padding="0" margin_top="-9" margin_bottom="0" margin_right="0" margin_left="20" width="244" animation="left" media="" image_alt="vc" hd_image="" image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/didyouknow.gif"][/dt_fancy_image][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="24"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#design" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0" type="5" bg_color="#f5f5f5"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Customize everything. Make your site unique!

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]No theme around offers such a vide range of customization options. The7 allows you to customize almost every aspect of its appearance via handy theme options panel.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]All colors & backgrounds are 100% editable[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]2 design styles: iOS7 & Minimalist [dt_highlight color="green"]new[/dt_highlight][/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]4 menu layouts & 3 menu hover styles [dt_highlight color="green"]new[/dt_highlight][/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]3 header layouts: normal, overlapping, transparent[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]4 page title layouts: disabled, left, right, centred[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Unique fancy headers (titles) for all posts & pages [/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]3 sidebar background styles [dt_highlight color="green"]new[/dt_highlight][/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Wide & boxed layouts[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]3 button styles: iOS7, flat & 3D [dt_highlight color="green"]new[/dt_highlight][/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]6 customisable portfolio & photo albums hover effects[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Easy to use colored content stripes (sections)[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]700+ Google Web Fonts + FontAwesome[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="85"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#layout" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="true" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0" type="5" bg_color="#ffffff"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Infinite page layouts with Visual Layout Builder

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]The7 comes with drag&drop Visual Layout Builder. You can create almost any imaginable page layout with the help of 60+ layout elements.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][vc_column_text]

[dt_button size="big" animation="none" icon="fa fa-play-circle" icon_align="right" color="" link="http://www.screenr.com/5GnH" target_blank="true"]Watch screencast[/dt_button]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Rows and columns, colored sections[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Widgetised sidebar + custom widgets[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Gaps, dividers & separators[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Lists, quotes, tooltips, buttons[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Banners, teasers, fancy media[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Message boxes, call to action area[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Progress bars, pie charts & counters[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Top & side tabs, accordion & toggle[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Portfolio (masonry, grid, slider)[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Blog (small, masonry, list)[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Testimonials, team, clients[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Google map[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Contact form[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Slideshows (Royal, Layer, Revolution)[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Posts carousel[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Social icons & share buttons[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="90"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#vcstripe" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0" min_height="0" type="4" bg_color="#23272a"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="36"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text]In its core layout builder is powered by Visual Composer - most popular, reliable and trusted premium drag&drop page building plugin for WordPress. It's being significantly improved and extended to host all the unique The7 layout elements.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="15"][vc_column_text]Normally it costs $30, but you’re getting it FREE as a part of The7 theme![/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="36"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_fancy_image type="" style="1" lightbox="0" align="centre" padding="0" margin_top="3" margin_bottom="0" margin_right="0" margin_left="0" width="265" animation="left" media="" image_alt="vc" hd_image="" image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/visual-composer-img.gif"][/dt_fancy_image][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="34"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#features" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0" type="5" bg_color="#ffffff"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Key features

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="60"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-resp.jpg"]

Responsive. Fluid. Retina-Ready.

Your site will always look sharp and utilize 100% of screen estate on every device. There are no jerky “responsiveness points”. Plus The7 features adaptive navigation menu on smaller screen sizes.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-seoimg.jpg"]

SEO-optimized

Themes valid HTML5 code meets best SEO practices. Theme is 100% compatible with industry-leading SEO plugins like “All on One SEO Pack” and “SEO by Yoast”.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-woocommerce.jpg"]

WooCommerce Support Out of the Box

That’s right – no need to mess with WooCommerce styling to fit your site perfectly. The7 will apply all required styles based on your design automatically![/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-lang.jpg"]

Translation and Multilingual ready

The7 is 100% translation ready and fully compatible with WPML.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-slider.jpg"]

Exclusive Slideshows

The7 features two slideshows developed exclusively for it: Porthole and 3D. Layer Slider, Metro (based on Swiper) and Revolution slider were heavily customized to fit theme perfectly.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-header.jpg"]

Multiple Header Options. Fancy Headers.

Make your pages, posts and projects stand out with individual headers. Choose one of 5 exclusive slideshows or a fancy header (3 layouts available).[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-skins.jpg"]

10 Ready-Made Skins & 2 styles

We’ve included 6 ready-made skins in different color schemes for different purposes. They can be a great starting point for your unique custom design. Moreover now you can switch from iOS7 to Minimalist style to get even cleaner and more universal look.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-save.jpg"]

More value for money - save $82

The7 comes bundled with premium plugins: Layer Slider, Slider Revolution, Visual Composer, Go Pricing tables. So you are getting even more awesome stuff while saving extra $82.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-plugins.jpg"]

Tested for compatibility with most popular plugins

Contact form 7, WPML, All in One Calendar, Events manager Pro, Gravity Forms, WooCommerce, SEO by Yoast, All in One Seo Pack, W3 Total Cache, WP Super Cache, JetPack, Luv Comments, Disqus, Geo Post, Ultimate Maintenance Mode, Jooseok Oh, NextGEN Gallery, etc.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/landing-support.jpg"]

Premium-class support for free!

Faced a problem? No worries – we have knowledge-base, interactive troubleshooter and our premium-class customer support service is always ready to help you.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

[dt_button size="big" animation="none" icon="fa fa-star" icon_align="right" color="" link="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/features/" target_blank="true"]More features[/dt_button]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="70"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#updatestripe" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0" min_height="0" bg_color="#23272a" type="4"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="36"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Regular updates. Built in collaboration with our users.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="20"][vc_column_text]The7 is one of the most innovative and fastest evolving themes on ThemeForest. Many features and layout elements that were first introduced in The7 are only making their way to other themes. Design customization tools are still unprecedented, and cannot be found in any other theme. Many layouts, sliders, scrollers, etc are unique! [dt_gap height="3" /] But more important, we’re moving The7 in the direction that you define. That’s why so many awesome stuff in The7 first started as users feature requests![/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="36"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text][dt_fancy_image type="" style="1" lightbox="0" align="centre" padding="0" margin_top="5" margin_bottom="0" margin_right="0" margin_left="0" width="290" animation="left" media="" image_alt="vc" hd_image="" image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2014/03/updates-img.gif"][/dt_fancy_image][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="34"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#testimonials" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0" bg_color="#ffffff"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Check out what buyers are saying

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]10 000+ of buyers. 5 star rating. Hundreds of positive feedbacks. Check out what buyers are saying about The7 and why they love it so much.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="50"][dt_testimonials type="masonry" padding="10" column_width="300" number="12" orderby="date" order="desc"][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]

[dt_button size="big" animation="none" icon="fa fa-comments" icon_align="right" color="" link="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/features/what-buyers-say-about-the7/" target_blank="true"]Read all reviews[/dt_button]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="90"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#support" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.2" min_height="0" type="5" enable_parallax="false" bg_color="#f5f5f5"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Customer care

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]Faced a problem? No worries – our premium class customer support service is always ready to help you.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
Extensive user manual
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
Training videos
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
Dedicated support team
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="5"][vc_column_text]

Support requests are being processed on business days from 8:00 to 17:00 (GMT 0.0) [normally] within 24h in the order they were received.

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="85"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#team" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0" type="5" bg_color="#ffffff"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]

Built by trusted power elite authors

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]We are Dream-Theme – an international web-design and development agency. Our 9 years’ experience in web dev allows us to create truly Premium WordPress Themes and provide our buyers with top-notch Customer Support. Read the article about us on Envato Notes if you want to know more.[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="20"][vc_column_text]
Myroslav
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="2"][vc_column_text]

founder front-end developer[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="20"][vc_column_text]

Irina
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="2"][vc_column_text]

founder web-designer[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="20"][vc_column_text]

programmer

support engineer

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="50"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#buy" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="-41" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="repeat-y" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="true" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.2" min_height="0" type="1" bg_image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/main/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2013/12/new-blue.jpg" bg_color="#2b4696"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="60"][vc_column_text]

Purchase The7 WordPress Theme today.

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
